content: Barrio in Portsmouth offers a fantastic Mexican dining experience. They are known for their creative tacos, which include options like the "Bombshell" featuring a blend of flour soft and corn hard shells, queso, crumbled bacon, Coca-Cola marinated steak, pan-seared portobellos, caramelized onions, and poblanos. They also serve a variety of other delicious Mexican dishes such as salsa & chips, prawns, and guacamole. Accompany your meal with their craft beer, tequila, or margaritas for a complete experience.
